class.name: Clusterer

javadoc.param: <T> * the type of points that can be clustered

javadoc.text: Build a new clusterer with the given {@link DistanceMeasure}.
javadoc.param: measure the distance measure to use

javadoc.text: Perform a cluster analysis on the given set of {@link Clusterable} instances.
javadoc.param: points the set of {@link Clusterable} instances
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if points are null or the number of * data points is not compatible with this clusterer
ConvergenceException if the algorithm has not yet converged after * the maximum number of iterations has been exceeded

javadoc.text: Returns the {@link DistanceMeasure} instance used by this clusterer.
Calculates the distance between two {@link Clusterable} instances * with the configured {@link DistanceMeasure}.
javadoc.return: the distance between the two clusterables
